resume_snippet: MICHELLE NELSON, PHD, CAPM SKILLS/SPECIAL QUALIFICATIONS: PhD in Medical Science from the University of Calgary, specializing in patient-oriented research and clinical trials in nephrology and cardiology. Several years of experience acting as sole clinical research coordinator and eventually Program Manager for the Precision Medicine in Nephrology Program, which oversees a precision medicine research portfolio and a large biobanking facility.
